field< oT > Class Template Reference
[Field]

#include <field_proto.hpp>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<typename oT>
class field< oT >

A lightweight 2D container for abitrary objects (the objects must have a copy constructor).

Definition at line 25 of file field_proto.hpp.

 Internal memory, allocated on the stack. < Designed to avoid calling the 'new' operator for small amounts of memory, resulting in considerable speedups. < Memory is allocated, via the 'new' operator, only if required.
